Name: STAR WARS™: TIE Fighter Special Edition
About the game: Become a recruit of the Imperial Navy under the command of Darth Vader, and pilot space vehicles that will leave you breathless. In the wake of the Battle of Hoth, through their treachery at Yavin, the alliance of Rebels and other criminals have threatened the very foundation of the peaceful Empire. The Imperial Navy is called upon to eradicate the last of the rebellion and restore law and order. As an Imperial navy starfighter pilot, you will safeguard imperiled lives thoughout the galaxy. Join the Emperor's cause in eliminating the Rebel uprising as the Empire strikes back! Key features: Includes STAR WARS ™: TIE Fighter and STAR WARS ™: TIE Fighter - Defender of the Empire , both 1994 (DOS) and 1998 (Windows) versions, and STAR WARS ™: TIE Fighter - Enemies of the Empire 1998 (Windows). Get swept away in story line loaded with spectacular cinematic cutscenes! Step into a 3D world filled with Imperial and Rebel starfighters!
